articles.title: Kim Jong Un Makes Public Treatise to Mark Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Makes Public Treatise to Mark Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un made public treatise titled "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" on April 20 to mark the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Kim Jong Un said in his treatise:
					
					 The celebrations of the centenary of the President's birth were the Korean people's expression of boundless reverence and noble sense of moral obligation towards him and a grand political festival of all people praising the 100-year-long history of Juche Korea. 
					
					 It is the greatest honor and pride of the Korean people and happiness of posterity to hold the President in high esteem as an  eternal leader as he is revered by the entire Korean nation and the world. 
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung was the most prominent leader and peerlessly great man in the 20th century.
					
					 The world does not know such a prominent leader, peerless patriot and great revolutionary as Kim Il Sung who glorified the 20th century as the century of victory in the cause of independence against imperialism, the cause of socialism while enjoying absolute support and confidence of the people from his teens to the 80s with his outstanding idea, leadership ability and noble virtues. 
					
					 His whole life was the noble life of a popular leader who regarded believing in people as in Heaven as his maxim and embodied it in his ideas and leadership, translating it into a reality.
					
					 It was thanks to the leadership of the President that the new historical era, there came the  Juche era in which the popular masses once sidelined in history hew out their own destiny by their own efforts in the center of the times and history. 
					
					 It was a historic event to be specially recorded in the history of human thinking and the revolutionary struggle of the popular masses that the President held aloft the banner of independence and formulated it as the principle and way for making a revolution and put it into practice. 
					
					 The President steadily developed the relations with foreign parties and states on the principle of independence.
					
					 He was an invincible and iron-willed commander and military genius who started the Korean revolution and led it to victory with arms. 
					
					 He was highly praised and deeply trusted by the world people as an iron-willed commander, outstanding strategist and a symbol of victory in the anti-imperialist struggle as he defeated the formidable enemies, the Japanese and U.S. imperialists who were superior in numerical strength and military technique with politico-ideological, strategic and tactical superiority in the last anti-Japanese revolutionary war and the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 He was the greatest man whom no one could match in the revolutionary traits and personality. 
					
					 For a long period since he embarked upon the road of the revolution, he suffered bitterest grief and agony, but he always thought of the revolution only and devoted his all to its victory. 
					
					 In the course of the protracted revolution, the President protected in a responsible manner the destiny and future of those whom he once made comrades. He took care of tens of thousands of revolutionary soldiers and deeply trusted them and showed every possible loving care for them. 
					
					 With warm humanity and exceptionally simple and unassuming personality, he took deep care of the people. 
					
					 He trusted all those who loved the country and the nation and put them forward as eternal companions in the way of working for them. 
					
					 He, possessed of broad and deep humanity, forged close friendship with many foreign party and state leaders as well as famous political, social and academic figures who aspired after independence. 
					
					 He had the biggest number of comrades and friends in the world. 
					
					 The President was the eternal leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people and the sun of Juche who laid the eternal foundation for the victorious advance and completion of the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 The President founded the great Juche idea, ushering in a new era of the Juche revolution and leading the social revolution at various stages to a shining victory by applying the Juche idea and  performing undying feats in all fields of the revolution and construction.
					
					 The Korean revolution is making a dynamic advance while working historic miracles in all domains of socialist construction despite unimaginable difficulties and ordeals. This is thanks to the WPK, a revolutionary party of Juche-type, the DPRK, a genuine people's government, and the matchless People's Army which were founded and developed by the President, and the people whom he reared to be strong in thinking and faith. 
					
					 The single-minded unity of the party, army and people around the leader firmly assures the political stability and solidity of the state and society and it serves as a powerful engine for defending the socialist country and vigorously pushing forward the revolution and construction. 
					
					 He successfully solved the issue of succession to the revolutionary cause, providing a sure guarantee for the steadfast succession and victorious completion of the revolutionary cause of Juche century after century and generation after generation. 
					
					 He, regarding the country's reunification as the most important patriotic cause of the nation, worked heart and soul for the development of the movement of the country's reunification and performed precious feats in the efforts to realize the cherished desire of the nation.
					
					 He checked and foiled the moves of the imperialist reactionaries for domination and worked hard for the development of the world socialist movement, the victory of independent cause against imperialism, the establishment of independent and fair international relations and global peace and security under the uplifted banner of independence and international justice.
					
					 The President is alive as the sun of Juche and the 100-year-long history of Juche Korea shines with his august name because leader Kim Jong Il firmly defended the idea and cause of the President and wisely led the drive for carrying out them.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the closest revolutionary comrade and the most faithful comrade-in-arms of the President as he upheld the President, regarding it as his lifelong mission to adhere to his idea and cause and glorify them.
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary idea of the President as Kimilsungism and put forth the modeling of whole society on Kimilsungism as the supreme programme for the party and the revolution, bringing about an epochal turn in carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 He made sure that the President was held in high esteem as the eternal leader of the party and people and the eternal President of the DPRK and aroused the whole party and army and all the people to the drive to carry out his behests, taking them as a programme of the party.
					
					 Under the banner of Songun, Kim Jong Il protected the dignity and supreme interests of the country and the nation in reliance on powerful arms and glorified the socialist country of Juche as an invincible socialist power.
					
					 Kim Jong Il ushered in the June 15 era of reunification and brought about a new phase in developing foreign relations with his energetic leadership true to the behests of the President.
					
					 The history of Kim Il Sung's nation, Kim Jong Il's Korea, is a glorious course in which the Korean revolution started in Mt. Paektu and has recorded victories. This is a path of eternal victory to be followed by the Korean people for final victory and a path of prosperity of the country.
					
					 It is the revolutionary duty and noble moral obligation of the party and people of the DPRK to hold Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem for all ages and successfully carry forward and accomplish generation after generation the revolutionary cause of Juche bequeathed by them, Kim Jong Un said in his treatise, putting forth the tasks for carrying them out.
					
					 Kim Jong Un called for firmly preserving and glorifying the idea and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for all ages, cherishing the unshakable conviction that they are with the Korean people forever.
					
					 He underlined the need to take Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the unique guiding idea and permanent guidelines of the Korean revolution and advance the revolution and construction as required by Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 He also called for carrying forward the idea and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the building of party, state and revolutionary armed forces and underscored the need to build the party, state and army in the way they did.
					
					 All the sectors and units should glorify the records of leadership provided by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il to them and carry through their behests to bring the intentions and desire in their lifetime into reality, Kim Jong Un said.
					
					 He also called for successfully carrying forward the Juche-oriented ideas of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on cultural construction and the feats performed by them in it and giving full play to the advantages and vitality of Korean-style socialist culture.
					
					 He stressed the need to accomplish the historic cause of national reunification without fail true to the noble patriotic intentions and last instructions of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, boost foreign relations of the DPRK in the idea of independence, peace and friendship and make positive contributions to global independence.
					
					 He stressed that the WPK and the army and people of the DPRK would faithfully carry forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the uplifted banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Greetings to Russian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Greetings to Russian President
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of Russia, on its national day.
					 Kim in the message expressed conviction that the traditional DPRK-Russia relations of friendship and cooperation would grow stronger in the spirit of the joint documents agreed between the two countries, wishing him great success in his responsible work for building a powerful Russia.

articles.title: Greetings to Russian PM, FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Russian PM, FM
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Dmitri Anatoliyevich Medvedev, prime minister of the Russian Federation, on its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the cooperative relations between the DPRK and Russia would further develop in the course of actively putting the agreements reached between the two countries in recent years into practice.
					
					 It wished the prime minister success in his work for socio-economic development of the country and welfare of the people.
					
					 On the same day DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a similar message to his Russian counterpart Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov.

articles.title: DPRK FM Sends Greetings to Philippine FM
articles.content:
DPRK FM Sends Greetings to Philippine FM
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Albert F. del Rosario, foreign minister of Philippines, Tuesday on the occasion of the 114th anniversary of its independence.
					 Pak in the message expressed the conviction that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would continue to favorably develop in line with common interests and desire of the two peoples.
					
					 He wished him success in his work.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets New Eritrean Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets New Eritrean Ambassador
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Tuesday met and had a talk with Tseggai Tesfazion, new Eritrean ambassador to the DPRK who paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Makes Field Survey of Projects for Renovating Funfairs
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Makes Field Survey of Projects for Renovating Funfairs 
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army, visited the Mangyongdae Funfair and the Taesongsan Funfair to learn about the progress made in the projects for renovating the funfairs.
					 The soldier-builders are making signal progress in the projects in hearty response to the order of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un to provide people with better conditions for entertainment.
					
					 Choe went round different places of the funfairs to acquaint himself with the projects.
					
					 He underlined the need for the soldier-builders to ensure the quality in the projects and conduct greening under a long-term plan as befitting the recreation grounds for people, bearing in mind Kim Jong Un's noble outlook on the people and future.
					
					 He took measures for solving the issues arising in the projects.
					
					 He called on the soldier-builders to complete the projects as scheduled unconditionally, true to the intention of Kim Jong Un to enable the people to enjoy wealth and prosperity under socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Gifts from Foreign Companies
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Gifts from Foreign Companies
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received gifts from the International Reinsurance Intermediaries Haakon Ltd. of Switzerland and the Cunningham Lindsey International Ltd. of the UK.
					 The gifts were separately handed by Eric Muller, executive vice president of the Swiss company, and Robert Dalton, managing director of the British company, participating in the Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar, to an official concerned on Tuesday.

articles.title: Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Eritrean Ambassador
articles.content:
Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Eritrean Ambassador
						
 Pyongyang, June 12  (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Tseggai Tesfazion, Eritrean ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
					 After receiving the credentials, Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Talks between Delegations of WPK, CPV Held
articles.content:
Talks between Delegations of WPK, CPV Held 
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Talks between delegations of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Communist Party of Vietnam (CPV) took place in Hanoi on Monday. 
					 Present there from the WPK side were members of its delegation led by Secretary of the Central Committee Kim Yong Il, who is alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, and Kim Chang Il, DPRK ambassador to Vietnam, and from the Vietnamese side members of the delegation of the CPV headed by Hoang Binh Quan, chairman of the Commission for External Affairs who is member of the C.C., CPV. 
					
					 At the talks held in friendly atmosphere both sides informed of the activities of their parties and exchanged views on boosting the friendly relations between the two parties and two countries and matters of mutual concern.
					
					 Hoang Binh Quan warmly congratulated once again the dear respected Kim Jong Un on his election as first secretary of the WPK at the Fourth Conference of the WPK in April and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK at the Fifth Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly. 
					
					 The WPK and the Korean people will surely build a thriving socialist nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, he said, and went on:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il's untimely passing away last year was a big loss to the WPK and Korean people. 
					
					 The grand celebrations of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung and the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il fully demonstrated the might of the single-minded unity of the Korean people. 
					
					 The CPV supports the principled stand of the WPK for peace, stability and denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and is strongly opposed to all forms of blockade and sanctions against the DPRK and interference in its internal affairs.
					
					 The CPV and Vietnamese people will always remember the sincere assistance rendered by the WPK and the Korean people and them in the past.

articles.title: Cuban Embassy Officials Help Farmers of DPRK in Farming
articles.content:
Cuban Embassy Officials Help Farmers of DPRK in Farming 
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials Tuesday gave a helping hand to farmers of the DPRK-Cuba Friendship Hwasong Greenhouse Farm in Ryongsong District, Pyongyang.
					 They weeded a field together with farmers.
					
					 During a break they had talks with officials of the farm, deepening the friendship.

articles.title: Russian Embassy Members Lay Wreaths before Liberation Towers and Graves of Fallen Fighters
articles.content:
Russian Embassy Members Lay Wreaths before Liberation Towers, Graves of Fallen Fighters
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Russian embassy here Tuesday laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower on the national day of Russia.
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Ambassador Alexandr Timonin and staff members of the Russian embassy here.
					
					 After laying the wreath in the name of the embassy, the participants observed a moment's silence to the memory of the fallen fighters of the Soviet Army.
					
					 They also placed a wreath and bouquets before the grave of the fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Sadong district, Pyongyang.
					
					 On Monday, the Russian consul-general and members of the consulate-general in Chongjin laid wreaths before the Liberation Tower and the grave of the fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Chongjin City.

articles.title: Members of AINDF Visit Ssuksom Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Members of AINDF Visit Ssuksom Revolutionary Site 
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and members of Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, visited the Ssuksom Revolutionary Site Tuesday on the occasion of the 12th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Being briefed on the fact that President Kim Il Sung came there together with south Korean politicians who took part in the Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Public Organizations in north and south Korea and clearly indicated the orientation and ways for national reunification and showed warm loving care for them, they looked round various places including the United Front Tower.
					
					 The chief noted that he got to know well about the undying feats of the President, who dedicated his all to the cause of national reunification through the visit, adding that leader Kim Jong Il formulated the Three Charters for National Reunification and ushered in the June 15 era to open a bright prospect for Korea's reunification.
					
					 The feats performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in leading the efforts for national reunification will shine forever, he said.
					
					 Chief Jo said that as the DPRK is led by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the cause of national reunification is sure to be achieved, expressing the will to wage a more vigorous struggle to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar Opens
articles.content:
Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar Opens
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar was opened at Yanggakdo International Hotel on Tuesday under the joint sponsorship of the Korean National Insurance Corporation (KNIC) and the Federation of Afro-Asian Insurers and Reinsurers.
					 The participants of the seminar are expected to hear valuable papers to be presented by insurance experts at home and abroad and personages on providing insurance guarantee for natural disasters and calamities and issues of international concern and have discussions on them.
					
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier of the Cabinet, So Tong Myong, chairman of the ECM of the KNIC who is chairman of the Organizing Committee of the seminar, insurance workers of the corporation and in local areas and officials concerned.
					
					 Among those present were Hammam Badr, secretary general of the Federation of Afro-Asian Insurers and Reinsurers, delegates and delegations of companies of Russia, Sudan, Switzerland, Britain, Australia, India, China and Tanzania, and the delegation of the Kumgang Insurance Company of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, foreign diplomatic envoys and staff members of foreign embassies and missions of international organizations here.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop in his congratulatory speech expressed belief that the seminar would be a significant gathering contributing to the development of insurance against natural disasters in each country as required by the times and provide an occasion of boosting solidarity and cooperation in business on the principles of friendship and mutual benefit.
					
					 Hammam Badr in his speech extended highest tribute and thanks to the peerlessly great men of the DPRK for extending support to the activities of the Federation, expressing his hope that speakers would help have a correct understanding of new challenges.
					
					Then followed speeches.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar Tuesday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 They made bows after laying before the statues a floral basket and bouquets reflecting deep reverence for the peerlessly great men who rendered devoted services for the development of friendship among countries and peoples and global independence.

articles.title: Participants in Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar Feted
articles.content:
Participants in Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar Feted
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The Organization Committee of the Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar and the Korean National Insurance Corporation hosted a banquet for participants in the seminar at Chongryu Restaurant Tuesday.
					 Present there on invitation were Hammam Badr, secretary general of the Federation of Afro-Asian Insurers and Reinsurers, the delegates and delegations of companies of Russia, Sudan, Switzerland, Britain, Australia, India, China and Tanzania, the delegation of the Kumgang Insurance Co., Ltd. of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and foreign diplomatic envoys and members of foreign embassies and international organizations here. 
					
					 Participating in the banquet were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier of the Cabinet, So Tong Myong, chairman of the ECM of the KNIC who is chairman of the Seminar, and officials concerned.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: DPRK's Western Coastal Area Plagued with Drought
articles.content:
DPRK's Western Coastal Area Plagued with Drought
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The western coastal area of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has been seriously affected by lingering drought starting in late April.
					 In June over 20 mm rainfall was witnessed in the eastern coastal area of the country, except Kosan and Thongchon plains in Kangwon Province, but less than 10 mm in some parts of Pyongyang and Nampho cities, South Phyongan and South and North Hwanghae provinces.
					
					 From June 1 to 5, 20 mm rainfall was registered in the northern part of the western coastal area and inland area of Jagang Province, with no rain in the areas south of the central part of the country and the eastern coastal area.
					
					 On June 10-11, it rained over 20 mm in the northern part of the western coastal area, some parts of the northern inland area and the eastern coastal area only.
					
					 There was little rainfall in the flat areas in the central part of the west coast, including Pyongyang, Onchon, Unryul, Jaeryong and Yonbaek plains.
					
					 There has been no rainfall from late April in Kangnam County in Pyongyang City, Anak County in South Hwanghae Province, Songrim City and Junghwa County in North Hwanghae Province, Ryonggang County and Kangso District in Nampho City and Unchon County in South Hwanghae Province.
					
					 In this period 1 to 5 mm rainfalls were reported in some parts of Pyongyang City, South Phyongan Province and North and South Hwanghae provinces, the lowest for Pyongyang City in 105 years.
					
					 The long spell of drought is attributable to the protrusion of high pressure from the East Sea of Korea and Okhotsk Sea staying in the air above the central part of Korea, preventing low pressure from passing through the central part.
					
					 A little amount of rain is expected in the western coastal area on June 14-15, with drought likely to last until June 20.

articles.title: DPRK Player Proves Successful at 2012 ITTF Euro-Africa Circuit
articles.content:
DPRK Player Proves Successful at 2012 ITTF Euro-Africa Circuit
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- DPRK Player Kim Song I placed first in women's singles of the 2012 ITTF Euro-Africa Circuit, Swedish Open.
					 The competition that took place from June 7 to 10 brought together many excellent players from different countries and regions.
					
					 Kim Song I defeated her south Korean rival 4:0 and Hungarian rival 4:2 in preliminaries and Spanish and Russian rivals 4:0 each in quarter-finals and semi-finals.
					
					 She won the gold medal by beating her Russian rival 4:3.

articles.title: Taedonggang Tile Factory
articles.content:
Taedonggang Tile Factory
						
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The Taedonggang Tile Factory in Pyongyang mass-produces a variety of quality tiles, traditional Korean roofing tiles and ceramic roofing tiles.
					 The building materials are widely used in many construction projects, including the Pyongyang Folklore Park.
					
					 Kil Song Ung, manager of the factory, told KCNA:
					
					 "The factory has supplied various kinds of tiles and roofing tiles to major construction projects throughout the country.
					
					 It has facilities for producing raw materials, tiles for floor, wall and roof decoration and marble tiles.
					
					 All production processes are streamlined.
					
					Roofing tiles are made with locally available tuff mixed with clay.
					
					 After finishing an anthracite gasification project, the factory has kept production going at a high rate.
					
					 When visiting the factory in July Juche 98 (2009), leader Kim Jong Il expressed satisfaction over its operation totally based on locally available raw materials, saying the factory had strictly established Juche in production.

articles.title: June 15 Era of Reunification Will Inevitably Come Again
articles.content:
June 15 Era of Reunification Will Inevitably Come Again
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Tension and confrontation have persisted in the Korean peninsula due to the traitor Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea that has abused the June 15 era of reunification as a "lost decade" and spoiled it in collusion with outside forces.
					 Lee's treacherous acts of blocking to the new era of great national unity and independent and peaceful reunification have invited strong denunciation from south Korean people and the world's progressives.
					
					 From the outset of Lee's office, south Korean people have described his "north policy" as a "policy of confrontation and absorption" and "failed policy."
					
					 His denial of the June 15 Joint Declaration adopted between the north and the south has also badly affected the south Korean economy.
					
					 According to south Korean media, the total collapse of the north-south economic cooperation and acute confrontation between the north and the south have seriously damaged the south Korean economy.
					
					 World media, too, say that the United States is seemingly backing south Korea but actually doing harm to it, ridiculing the south Korean regime for clinging to the U.S. while standing against the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 If a war breaks out on the Korean peninsula, it will be south Korea that will suffer the most. The United States may support or sympathize with south Korea, but will never share the losses.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime will surely be punished by those who will revive the June 15 era of reunification, for its crimes of having brought only misfortunes to the nation with the policy of confrontation.

articles.title: Poor Mental and Cultural Life Is Inevitable Product of Capitalism: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Poor Mental and Cultural Life Is Inevitable Product of Capitalism: Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Poor mental and cultural life is peculiar to exploiter society, capitalism in particular.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 Social inequality and imbalance have reached the limit in the capitalist countries and the reactionary and unpopular nature of their policies has become more serious, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 The financial and economic crises sweeping capitalist society are hastening the degradation of mental and cultural life of people.
					
					 The suicide rate has recorded remarkable increase in the capitalist countries.
					
					 School youth and children of poor families are looking for means of living to support their families after giving up their desire to learn.
					
					 Those who were mentally degraded due to hard life and hopeless future are trying to forget all their troubles with alcohol, drug, etc.
					
					 The capitalist media are spreading all sorts of reactionary ideas such as the almighty dollar principle, extreme selfishness, pessimism and racial chauvinism and literature and arts works representing them as well as all kinds of superstitions and decadent lifestyle.
					
					 The lifestyle based on the law of the jungle and all descriptions of immorality and depravity are turning capitalist society into the world of violence and crimes.
					
					 The people are getting all the more mentally degraded by the decadent material life.
					
					 Decadent and imbalanced material life and poor mental and cultural life are causing lots of contradictions in capitalist society.
					
					 Capitalism is on its way to ruin.

articles.title: Minju Joson Discloses Danger of U.S. Cyber Strategy
articles.content:
Minju Joson Discloses Danger of U.S. Cyber Strategy
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Defense Department was recently reported to have worked out a secret plan named PLAN-X for the purpose of developing cyber weapons to be used in an actual war and has zealously pushed it forward. What merits attention is that this plan calls for developing cyber weapons capable of completely disabling communication network and radars of enemy armies and working out an e-map which correctly records positions of tens of billions of computers distributed in the world.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a dangerous move to spark off showdown and a hot arms race in cyber space.
					
					 Cyber weapons serve as a means for achieving the U.S. wild ambition for dominating the world at present.
					
					 In May last year the U.S. defined cyber space as its new military sphere in its cyber strategy. It clarified that it would make retaliation with conventional military strength against the cyber attack which posed a "threat" to its national security.
					
					 This meant the U.S. official declaration of a start of cyber war before the world.
					
					 The subsequent period witnessed fierce wars without gun report in cyber space.
					
					 The U.S. is now making much fuss, simplifying the procedures for providing funds for the development of the weapons and pushing ahead with PLAN-X for disabling all the computers of the enemy armies in case of emergency. This entails such serious consequences as escalating confrontation and arms race between the two opposing sides in cyber space.
					
					 A war may break out in cyber space due to the U.S. implementation of its extremely reckless and dangerous cyber strategy for world domination.
					
					 It goes without saying that escalated confrontation in cyber space, arms race and cyber war are bound to do enormous harm to people.
					
					 It is not without reason that the international community strongly calls for achieving peace in cyber space.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Dismisses Lee Myung Bak Group's Much Ado about Spy Cases
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Dismisses Lee Myung Bak Group's Much Ado about Spy Cases
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group in south Korea is now making much ado about "spy" cases against the backdrop of a noisy ruckus for "eliminating the forces following the north." They are busy floating the wild rumor that they arrested "a woman spy" and she might be linked with the "forces following the north" in south Korea. They are also conducting an investigation into a "spy" who was allegedly former unconverted long-term prisoner, charging he handed GPS disturbing technology to the north.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is no more than a clumsy farce orchestrated by the puppet forces themselves to turn the situation favorable for them by pulling up the DPRK.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group is claiming the former unconverted long-term prisoner provided such technology to the north, but this turned out to be a sheer fabrication at once, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 There is no evidence proving the transfer of such technology and, moreover, the military held that it cannot be viewed as a leakage of military secret because this kind of technology is no longer secret but it is ordinary information that can be easily found everywhere.
					
					 The "woman spy case" and the "spy case of former unconverted long-term prisoner" are nothing but cheap farces premeditated and orchestrated by the group of traitors, old hands at conspiracy and fabrications.
					
					 It is the trite method of the puppet ruling quarters to cook up shocking cases and divert elsewhere the public opinion whenever they find themselves in an extreme ruling crisis.
					
					 The puppet conservative group is mulling using those "spy cases" for creating a new alarming situation under the pretext of "security" in a bid to secure a justification for kicking up the racket for "eliminating the forces following the north" and for intensifying the suppression of the progressive and pro-reform forces. It is the ulterior aim of the "spy cases" to mercilessly suppress the progressive and pro-reform forces by branding them as "pro-north forces, those following the north" under the pretext of disclosed "spy cases" and weaken their alliance and unity and thus realize its stay in power.
					
					 Liars have short wings and any intrigue to hurt others can never work in the present bright world.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Moral Vulgarity Peculiar to Japan
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Moral Vulgarity Peculiar to Japan
						
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Craftiness and impudence are indicative of moral vulgarity peculiar to Japan, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 As for the hideous crimes in which 200 000 Korean women were forced into sexual slavery, the Japanese reactionaries are describing it as "an act done by prostitutes of their own accord for money". It was Japan which supported state-sponsored prostitution for the occupation army.
					
					 The Japanese ruling forces said that the base state-sponsored prostitution was aimed to "preserve the purity of the nation and guarantee the future after 100 years". But this was aimed to keep the political system of militarism and war means at the cost of reducing their women to be sexual slaves for the U.S. armed forces.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are denying state responsibility for the sexual slavery and describing it as acts promoted by individuals and voluntary acts of prostitutes. Lurking behind this is their crafty calculation to hush up the crime of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 A cross section of Japanese society ranging from politicians to media persons who should speak for justice and conscience has persistently denied Japan's past wrongdoings. This moral vulgarity peculiar to Japan is mainly attributable to society that is turning to the right and militaristic.
					
					 It has become the ethics for Japan to praise chauvinism and militarization.
					
					 It has buckled down to the begging diplomacy to have the monument to comfort women for Imperial Japanese Army withdrawn with a petty amount of money. How pitiful and dirty it is. Japan is making desperate efforts to cover up facts with money. Its poor gimmick reflects the vulgar way of thinking of an economic animal.
					
					  The more Japan tries to distort and deny history of thrice-cursed crimes, the more monuments will be built in different parts of the world.
					
					  With no gimmick can Japan ever cover up its blood-woven criminal past where souls with pent-up wrath still linger.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Lee Myung Bak Group's Saber-rattling
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Lee Myung Bak Group's Saber-rattling 
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea is driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink after pushing the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse. 
					 The south Korean Joint Chiefs of Staff staged the farce of making an emergency examination of the counteraction posture of the army under the stimulated conditions of the north's long-range artillery attack at dawn of Monday. 
					
					 It was reported that this farce was staged with main emphasis on rounding off the posture to promptly strike the north's bases for provocation and supporting forces. 
					
					 The south Korean warmongers' moves to do harm to the DPRK by force of arms have reached a frenzied and full-scale phase. 
					
					 They made public an adventurous operational plan for "preemptive attack" on the DPRK.
					
					 They also worked out a "plan for hitting fixed targets" aimed at "striking Pyongyang" under the pretexts of "a surprise attack" and "possible provocations".
					
					 They are bluffing that the operational plan for "preemptive attack" is aimed at "destroying major facilities in the north" in three days after the outbreak of an all-out war. According to it, they deployed bunker-buster GBU-28 to destroy the north's underground military facilities and long-range artillery pieces. 
					
					 They staged "drills for checking the posture to cope with a local war" under the stimulated conditions of "warship assault and provocative shelling and intrusion into major core facilities" in the eastern coastal area. They also staged the largest-ever combined air battle drill with the U.S.
					
					 Crying out for "punishment" and "precision strike", they committed such dangerous military provocation as conducting a demonstration firing drill with MLRS involved  in the forefront area less than 10 kilometers from the north side.
					
					 This goes to prove that the Lee group of traitors singled out "preemptive attack" as a war strategy against the north under the pretext of non-existent "nuclear and missile threats from the north" and are now working in real earnest to put it into practice. 
					
					 The ceaseless north-targeted saber-rattling has become one of the basic methods of warmongers at home and abroad to escalate the tension on the Korean Peninsula and ignite a war. Such drills have been staged more than 1 600 times since traitor Lee came to power.
					
					 Prevailing on the peninsula is such grave situation that an all-out war may break out even a hundred times.
					
					 Driven into an extreme crisis, the group of traitors seeks to ignite a nuclear war.
					
					 The military actions being taken by them against the backdrop of acute tension are like a time bomb.
					
					 These actions will bring them nothing but destruction and death.

articles.title: Has S. Korea Anything to Say over Human Rights: KCNA
articles.content:
Has S. Korea Anything to Say over Human Rights: KCNA
 Pyongyang June 12 (KCNA) -- The anti-DPRK "human rights" hysterics of traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea has reached an extreme phase.
					 Not content with mobilizing vicious conservatives and hack papers in taking issue with "human rights" and "people's livelihood" in the DPRK, they made no scruple of sending human scum to different parts of south Korea and other countries to kick off the black-hearted "human rights" farce.
					
					 Recently the traitor supported the "human rights ruckus" of his American and Japanese masters, blustering that "the north's 'human rights issue' is an urgent matter to be dealt with and settled before its nuclear and missile issues."
					
					 It is a revelation of a base and black-hearted intention to hurt the international prestige of the DPRK, curb the influence of the might of its single-minded unity and mercilessly suppress the anti-Lee Myung Bak struggle and the movement for reunification through alliance with the north that runs high among south Koreans by building public opinion over the non-existent "human rights issue".
					
					 The "human rights issue" touted by the hostile forces does not exist nor can it exist in the DPRK as the independent rights and creative activities of the popular masses are institutionally guaranteed in the country.
					
					 The people of the DPRK are admired by south Korean compatriots as they enjoy genuine freedom and rights of independent human being as full-fledged masters of the state and society.
					
					 South Koreans have turned out in the movement for reunification through the alliance with the north, saying that the future of reunified Korea belongs to the DPRK, socialist society centered on the popular masses.
					
					 Upset by this, the conservative group is going reckless in its bid to incite hostility towards compatriots among people of different social strata through the anti-DPRK "human rights" ruckus and realize the wild ambition for "unification of social systems" against the nation without fail.
					
					 To talk of the human rights, the miserable situation in south Korea must come on top of agenda as it is subservient to foreign forces and dictatorship stalks there.
					
					 South Korea, a theater of sycophantic acts toward the U.S., the misrule and the fascist dictatorship, is just a hell of people, the kingdom of suicide and tundra of human rights.
					
					 This can be illustrated by the tragic fate met by evacuees of Ryongsan, the case of an illegal investigation into civilians, the base politically-motivated plot and revenge that forced former "presidents" to untimely deaths, the actions to gag media, the campaign of cracking down upon the democratic forces under the pretext of "eliminating the forces following the north", etc.
					
					 No wonder, the majority of south Korean middle schoolers said they want to live in foreign countries, being disillusioned at their society.
					
					 South Korea suffers from the chronic human rights disease due to legal and institutional mechanism that is geared for human rights abuses such as the "National Security Law", restriction on access to internet and maltreatment of soldiers. Even their American master could not but refer to the poor human rights performance in south Korea in its "annual human rights report".
					
					 The atmosphere of revenge on traitor Lee who recorded the worst misrule and corruption in the history of the human rights, democracy and inter-Korean relations is causing the fight among rulers, to say nothing of people of different social strata in south Korean society, shaking the ruling foundation of the puppet regime down to its roots.
					
					 Such a base "human rights" ruckus by the traitor will only show the ugly true colors of those who are intent on confrontation with compatriots.

articles.title: Lee Group's Suppression of South Headquarters of Pomminryon Protested
articles.content:
Lee Group's Suppression of South Headquarters of Pomminryon Protested
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea sentenced Chairman Ri Kyu Jae, former Secretary General Ri Kyong Won and former Chairperson of the Publicity Committee Choe Un A of the South Headquarters of Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) to prison terms on June 8.
					 The South Headquarters of Pomminryon held a press conference outside the building of the Seoul Central District Court that day in protest against the unjust court ruling.
					
					 At the conference the speakers declared their total rejection of the judgment.
					
					 The despicable group, fearful of truth and justice and blinded with avarice, is cracking down upon the pro-reunification activists by invoking the draconic "Security Law", they noted.
					
					 They stated they would foil the regime's politically-motivated suppression of the organization and rescue the prisoners of conscience without fail. 
					
					 They vowed to eliminate Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye forces making desperate efforts to stay in corrupt power by kowtowing to the U.S. and Japan and build society, independent and democratic.

articles.title: Implementation of Inter-Korean Declaration Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Implementation of Inter-Korean Declaration Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- 31 civic and public organizations in south Korea held a press conference outside the building of Chongwadae on June 7 to form the "preparatory committee for a meeting to mark the 12th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration".
					 They included the Seoul Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the Confederation of Trade Unions and the Solidarity for Progress.
					
					 A press release was read out at the press conference.
					
					 It accused the Lee Myung Bak "government" of having struck down all the achievements in the June 15 era of reunification and increased the military tensions and conflicts between the south and the north.
					
					 The "government" has intensified its policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen this year, the press release noted, adding Lee Myung Bak aligned himself with the "Saenuri Party" and conservative media to make unprecedentedly serious provocations against the north, including open slanders against it.
					
					 The "government" has stirred up an atmosphere of confrontation with hysteria of "coloring" operation and violated the people's elementary rights to existence and democratic rights, including freedom of speech, the press release said.
					
					 The regime seeks a foolish attempt to create an atmosphere favorable to it ahead of "presidential election" in a bid to maintain its power, the release noted.
					
					 It urged the Lee Myung Bak regime and the "Saenuri Party" to stop their confrontation moves and take a sincere approach to implementing the June 15 joint declaration signed by the south and the north.
					
					 It called on south Koreans of all social strata to continue their struggle for achieving national reconciliation and cooperation and peace of the peninsula in the run-up to the 12th anniversary of the declaration.

articles.title: S. Korean Youth Accuse Lee Myung Bak of Increasing Tension
articles.content:
S. Korean Youth Accuse Lee Myung Bak of Increasing Tension
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration made public a statement calling for opposition to war, realization of peace and improvement of south-north relations" at a press conference in Seoul on June 7.
					 The organization denounced the Lee regime in south Korea for having pushed ties with the north to deadlock in violation of the joint declarations and cried out for "no nukes, opening and 3 000 dollars" and severed civilian exchange by taking "May 24 steps" under the pretext of the "Cheonan" warship sinking case.
					
					 The south Korean "government" authorities have persistently made remarks and acts provoking the north from the beginning of its office, the statement said, accusing them of staging large-scale war drills to strengthen military alliance with the U.S. and Japan.
					
					 Recently the authorities have tried to set people at odds by kicking off a campaign against "forces following the north" and escalated crackdown on progressive forces and pro-reunification activists on charges of violation of the "Security Law", the statement said.
					
					 The present "government" has been intent on pushing the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war by irritating the north and fostering feud in society, and letting the conservative Cold War-minded forces stay in power by fabricating threadbare "north wind", it added.
					
					 It urged the "government" to withdraw the theory of "forces following the north" and stop oppression under the pretext of security that runs counter to democracy and peaceful reunification but come out to improve the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of Russia and Bangladesh carried articles on the occasion of the 12th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The 21st issue of the Russian newspaper Patriot in an article titled "Korean nation can never live separated from each other" said that the inter-Korean declaration opened a rosy prospect for achieving great national unity while demonstrating its vitality.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not be allowed to give up their commitment made before the world under any circumstances, the article held.
					
					 It stressed Korea's reunification is sure to be achieved as it is led by ardent patriot Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Ekota on June 5 in an article titled "Korea's reunification and the idea of 'By our nation itself'" noted that Korea was divided into two parts by outside forces, not due to any contradiction within the nation.
					
					 Saying that peace and security on the Korean Peninsula means global peace and security, the article warned that if a war breaks out in the peninsula, it will lead to a thermo-nuclear war which mankind has never experienced.
					
					 The implementation of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration is the only way for achieving national reunification, concluded the article.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Party Leader Slams U.S. Human Rights Reports
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Party Leader Slams U.S. Human Rights Reports 
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Khaleq Zaman Bhuiyan, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Socialist Party of Bangladesh, supported the statement issued by a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry denouncing the U.S. "country reports on human rights practices for 2011".
					 He noted in a statement on June 3 that in its reports the U.S. malignantly slandered the DPRK and other independent countries opposed to domination.
					
					 The U.S. has run the whole gamut of military threats and nuclear blackmail for decades to stifle the DPRK by force, he said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. has recently come out with "human rights issue" and "the issue of people's living". The U.S. is claiming as if it were interested in "people's living" in the DPRK but it is the U.S. which has most persistently barred the DPRK from developing the economy and improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 Bitterly denouncing the U.S. reports as the height of politicization and double standards of human rights and a vivid expression of distortions and fabrications, he declared his party fully supported the statement issued by a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry laying bare the ulterior aim sought by the U.S. in talking about "human rights issue" and "the issue of people's living".

articles.title: Pochonbo Battle Introduced by French Organization
articles.content:
Pochonbo Battle Introduced by French Organization
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The France-Korea Friendship Association posted on its Internet homepage on June 4 an article with a painting portraying President Kim Il Sung victoriously commanding the Pochonbo Battle on the occasion of the 75th anniversary of the victory in the Pochonbo Battle.
					 June 4, 1937 is a historic day when the President led the battle to victory, bringing the dawn of liberation to the Korean people, the article said, and went on:
					
					 As the President fired a signal pistol, members of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army attacked Japanese ruling machines including the police post, the sub-county office, the post office and the fire station in Pochonbo. They also pasted "The Ten-Point Programme of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland" and scattered leaflets in different parts of the town.
					
					 In a speech made before the people who turned out in street the President called upon them to rise up in a sacred war for Korea's liberation.
					
					 The Korean people's anti-Japanese resistance mounted high with the Pochonbo Battle as a momentum.
					
					 The France-Korea Friendship Association pays highest tribute to the President, who made a great contribution to accomplishing the cause of Korea's liberation, on the occasion of the 75th anniversary of the victory in the Pochonbo Battle, the article noted.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un publica tesis dedicada al 100o Dia del Sol (texto detallado)
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un publica tesis dedicada al 100o Dia del Sol (texto detallado)
Pyongyang, 12 de junio (ACNC) -- En ocasion del centenario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un hizo publica el 20 de abril la tesis "El gran camarada Kim Il Sung es el lider eterno de nuestro partido y pueblo".
					 En su tesis, Kim Jong Un subrayo que los recientes festejos del centenario del natalicio del Presidente fueron la expresion de profunda veneracion y noble obligacion moral del pueblo coreano hacia el y un gran festival politico en que toda la humanidad elogio la historia centenaria de la Corea del Juche.
					
					 Abajo sigue el texto detallado de la tesis:
					
					 El pueblo coreano tuvo la gloria y orgullo mas grandes y aseguro la felicidad de todas las generaciones venideras, al enaltecer como eterno lider al camarada Kim Il Sung, respetado por toda la nacion y el mundo entero.
					
					 El camarada Kim Il Sung es el mas destacado lider y Gran Hombre sin par del siglo XX.
					
					 No hubo otro lider, patriota y revolucionario tan extraordinario como el que corono el siglo XX como el de victoria de la causa de independencia antiimperialista y la socialista bajo el apoyo y la confianza absoluta del pueblo que ganaba como reconocimiento a su idea y direccion extraordinarias y nobles virtudes durante largo tiempo desde a la edad tierna de diez y tantos anos hasta a la edad avanzada de 80 anos.
					
					  Toda su vida fue la noble de lider popular que tomo como maxima de vida el ideario Iminwichon (el pueblo es cielo) y lo hizo realidad materializandolo en sus pensamientos y direccion.
					
					  Cuando el camarada Kim Il Sung fue enaltecido como lider, comenzo la nueva epoca de la historia, la del Juche, en que las masas populares, que antes estuvieron al margen de la historia, forjan su destino por cuenta propia poniendose en el centro de la epoca y la historia.
					
					  Constituye un evento historico digno de registrarse en letras mayusculas en la historia de pensamientos de la humanidad y de lucha revolucionaria de las masas populares el hecho de que el haya levantado por primera vez la bandera de independencia y la haya definido como principio y modo de la revolucion.
					
					  Desarrollo sin cesar en el principio de independencia tambien las relaciones con los partidos y Estados de otros paises.
					
					  El fue invencible general de acero y genio militar que allano el camino de la revolucion coreana y la condujo a la victoria con las fuerzas armadas.
					
					   Por haber derrotado con ventajas ideo-politicas y estrategico-tacticas a los enemigos imperialistas superiores en lo numero y tecnico en la pasada Guerra Revolucionaria Antijaponesa y la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, todo el mundo veneraba muchisimo y confiaba en el llamandolo como general de acero, extraordinario estratega militar y simbolo de victoria en la lucha antiimperialista.
					
					  Ese gran hombre no tenia parangon tanto en las cualidades de revolucionario como en las virtudes humanas.
					
					  Durante largo tiempo desde el inicio de sus actividades revolucionarias, penso unicamente en la revolucion y dedico todo lo suyo por el triunfo de ella resistiendo todas las tristezas y amarguras que pueda sufrir el hombre.
					
					   Durante su larga carrera de revolucionario, se responsabilizaba y protegia hasta el final el destino y el futuro de todos que se hicieron sus camaradas.
					
					 Y depositaba gran confianza y dispensaba inmensas benevolencias a decenas de miles de soldados revolucionarios.
					
					   Tambien trataba y atendia cordialmente al pueblo dando pruebas de su humanidad, modestia y franqueza.
					
					   Abrazaba en su regazo y depositaba confianza en cualesquiera que amaran el pais y la nacion presentandolos como companeros eternos en la causa por la patria y la nacion.
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung, que tenia profunda y amplia humanidad, trabo estrecha amistad con los lideres del partido y el Estado, las renombradas personalidades del circulo politico, el social y el academico de varios paises del mundo que aspiraban a la independencia.
					
					  Nuestro Presidente fue el que tenia mas camaradas y amigos en este mundo.
					
					  El es eterno lider del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano y el Sol del Juche que sento la eterna piedra angular para el avance victorioso y el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					El camarada Kim Il Sung abrio la nueva era de la revolucion jucheana al concebir la gran idea Juche y en virtud de ella, condujo a la victoria fulminante la revolucion social de varias etapas y realizo inmortales hazanas en todas las ramas de la revolucion y la construccion.
					
					Gracias al PTC, partido revolucionario del tipo Juche, al verdadero poder del pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y al invencible Ejercito Popular de Corea, fundados y desarrollados por el Presidente, y al pueblo coreano formado por el como el fuerte en idea y conviccion, la revolucion coreana avanza hoy, al igual que en el siglo pasado, creando milagros de la historia en todos los sectores de la construccion socialista superando las dificultades y pruebas inimaginables.
					
					La unidad monolitica de todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo en torno al lider, garantiza hoy dia la estabilidad politica y la solidez del Estado y la sociedad de Corea y sirve de potente motor en la defensa de la patria socialista, la revolucion y la construccion.
					
					El camarada Kim Il Sung resolvio perfectamente el problema de sucesion de la causa revolucionaria preparando asi la garantia de continuar victoriosamente de siglo en siglo y generacion tras generacion la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Tomando la reunificacion de la patria como suprema causa patriotica de la nacion, trabajo con todo su empeno por el fortalecimiento y el desarrollo del movimiento por la reintegracion territorial y acumulo asi preciosas proezas en las labores para realizar ese anhelo de la nacion.
					
					Levantando en alto la bandera de independencia y la de justicia internacional, trabajo activamente para frustrar las acciones dominacionistas de los reaccionarios imperialistas, intensificar y desarrollar el movimiento socialista mundial, lograr la victoria de la causa de independencia antiimperialista, establecer independientes y equitativas relaciones internacionales y alcanzar la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung vive siempre como Sol del Juche y la primera centuria de la Corea del Juche brilla con su nombre gracias al Dirigente           Kim Jong Il quien defendio con firmeza la ideologia y la causa del primero y condujo sabiamente la lucha por cumplirlas.
					
					Kim Jong Il fue el camarada revolucionario y companero de armas mas intimo y mas fiel al Presidente.
					
					El enaltecio al Presidente tomando como mision de toda su vida defender y glorificar la idea y la causa del segundo.
					
					Al definir la idea revolucionaria del Presidente como el Kimilsungismo y presentar la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun ese pensamiento como maximo programa del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y la revolucion coreana, el Dirigente registro un viraje revolucionario en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					El Dirigente hizo enaltecer al Presidente como eterno lider del PTC y el pueblo y eterno Presidente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y llamo a todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo a materializar el legado del Presidente tomandolo por el programa del Partido. 
					
					El defendio la dignidad y los supremos intereses de la patria y la nacion e hizo brillar la patria socialista del Juche como una potencia socialista invicta basandose en las poderosas fuerzas armadas y sosteniendo en alto la bandera del Songun.
					
					En pleno acato al legado del Presidente, el Dirigente abrio con su energica guia la era de reunificacion del 15 de Junio y una nueva coyuntura en el desarrollo de las relaciones exteriores.
					
					La historia de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y la Corea de Kim Jong Il es la trayectoria gloriosa en que la revolucion coreana dio su primer paso en el Paektu y vino triunfando hasta la fecha, y la senda de victoria eterna y prosperidad de la patria que debemos seguir emprendiendo por la victoria final.
					
					Le corresponden al partido y al pueblo el deber revolucionario y la noble obligacion moral de enaltecer siempre al camarada Kim Il Sung y al camarada Kim Jong Il y continuar generacion tras generacion la causa revolucionaria del Juche, legada por ellos, hasta su feliz termino.
					
					Deben defender y glorificar la idea y las hazanas del Presidente y el Dirigente guardando en lo profundo del corazon la invariable fe de que el camarada Kim Il Sung y el camarada Kim Jong Il viven siempre en nosotros.
					
					Hay que impulsar la revolucion y la construccion segun los requerimientos de Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo tomando esta doctrina como unica y eterna idea directiva de la revolucion.
					
					Es preciso continuar integramente la idea y las hazanas del Presidente y el Dirigente en la construccion del partido, el Estado y las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y cumplir esta tarea a la manera de ellos.
					
					En todas las ramas y unidades, deben llevar a la realidad lo que se proponian y deseaban en su vida el Presidente y el Dirigente, al conservar y transmitir bien sus huellas de direccion registradas en sus centros de trabajo y cumplir cabalmente sus legados.
					
					En continuacion de la idea y hazanas de ellos en materia de construccion de la autoctona cultura, hay que hacer mas ventajosa y vital la cultura socialista al estilo nuestro.
					
					Segun el noble proposito patriotico y legados  del Presidente y el Dirigente, se debe cumplir sin falta la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria, ampliar y desarrollar las relaciones exteriores del pais bajo el ideal de independencia, paz y amistad y contribuir activamente a la causa de verificacion de la independencia en el mundo entero.
					
					El PTC, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea llevaran a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche continuando con fidelidad la idea y la causa del camarada Kim Il Sung y el camarada Kim Jong Il bajo la bandera de Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Putin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Putin
Pyongyang, 12 de junio (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 12 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Federacion Rusa Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin.
					El mensaje va como sigue:
					
					Con motivo de la fiesta nacional de la FR envio felicitacion a usted y al pueblo ruso.
					
					Estoy convencido de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Corea-Rusia de larga historia seguiran ampliandose y desarrollandose conforme a los documentos comunes acordados entre ambas partes.
					
					Deseo exitos en su labor responsable por construir Rusia poderosa y el bienestar y prosperidad del amistoso pueblo ruso.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a Putin
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a Putin
Pyongyang, 12 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia Nacional de la Federacion Rusa, Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio este martes un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente ruso, Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin.
					En su misiva, el remitente expresa la esperanza de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Corea-Rusia se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran en virtud de los documentos comunes acordados entre ambas partes y desea grandes exitos al destinatario en su labor responsable para construir una Rusia poderosa.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre delegaciones de PTC y PCV
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre delegaciones de PTC y PCV
Pyongyang, 12 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar la vispera en Hanoi las conversaciones entre las delegaciones del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Partido Comunista de Vietnam.
					Estuvieron presentes los miembros de la delegacion del PTC presidida por Kim Yong Il, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del PTC, y el embajador coreano en Vietnam Kim Chang Il, por la parte coreana y por la vietnamita, los miembros de la delegacion del PCV presidida por Hoang Binh Quan, miembro del CC del PCV y jefe de departamento de Asuntos Exteriores.
					
					En las conversaciones efectuadas en el ambiente amistoso, ambas partes se informaron las actividades de sus respectivas organizaciones e intercambiaron sus criterios sobre el tema de desarrollar las relaciones de amistad entre los dos partidos y dos paises y otros de interes mutuo.
					
					Hoang Binh Quan destaco que felicita calurosamente otra vez por el hecho de que el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un fue electo como Primer Secretario del PTC y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC.
					
					Acoto que la celebracion con solemnidad de las festividades por el centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el septuagesimo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il demostro vigorosamente el poderio de la unidad monolitica del pueblo coreano.
					
					Puntualizo que bajo la sabia orientacion de el, el PTC y el pueblo coreano realizaran sin falta la causa de la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					Prosiguio que el PCV apoya la posicion de principios del PTC por la paz, la estabilidad y la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y se opone rotundamente a la sancion y bloqueo de toda indole y la injerencia en los asuntos internos de Corea.
					
					El PCV y los vietnamitas siente agradecidos y nunca olvidara por el hecho de que en el tiempo pasado el PTC y el pueblo coreano hayan ofrecido una ayuda sincera, puntualizo.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae recorre parques de atracciones en reconstruccion
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae recorre parques de atracciones en reconstruccion
						
Pyongyang, 12 de junio (ACNC) -- Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio los Parques de Atracciones de Mangyongdae y Taesongsan en plena reconstruccion.
					Todos los constructores militares logran cada dia exitos innovadores en la obra para cumplir el proposito del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un de facilitar al pueblo mejores condiciones de descanso cultural.
					
					Recorriendo varios puntos de los parques, Choe estudio en detalles el estado de reconstruccion.
					
					Se tomaron las medidas para solucionar los problemas que se presentan en la obra, tales como exigir a los constructores militares que aseguren la calidad de las construcciones e impulsen con vistas al futuro la repoblacion forestal aprendiendo la concepcion del pueblo y el futuro del Comandante Supremo.
					
					Choe exhorto a terminar incondicionalmente la obra en el plazo fijado segun la voluntad del Comandante Supremo de hacer vivir al pueblo en las opulencias bajo el regimen socialista.
